code: import{ADD_PATIENT,DELETE_PATIENT,EDIT_PATIENT,SET_PATIENTS}from'./types';import axios from'axios';export var setPatients=function setPatients(patients){return{type:SET_PATIENTS,payload:patients};};export var addPatient=function addPatient(patient){return{type:ADD_PATIENT,payload:patient};};export var deletePatient=function deletePatient(id){return{type:DELETE_PATIENT,id:id};};export var editPatient=function editPatient(patient){return{type:EDIT_PATIENT,payload:patient};};export var fetchPatients=function fetchPatients(url){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url).then(function(res){return res.data;}).then(function(data){dispatch(setPatients(data));}).catch(function(err){return console.error('Server connections error');});};};
